title: Asante on African American oratory - identify

content.question: The excerpt reflects the features that characterize African American Studies by

choices.label: examining the development of ideas about Africaâ€™s ongoing relationship with the African diaspora
using an interdisciplinary approach to analyze the history and culture of African Americans
clearing up misconceptions that characterize Africa as a place with an undocumented or unknowable history
using scholarly inquiry to affirm early Africa as a diverse continent with complex societies

content.answer: using an interdisciplinary approach to analyze the history and culture of African Americans

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
